title: Okashi Na Akuyaku Reijou Wa Botsurakugo Ni Amatou No Ouji Ni Karamareru You Ni Narimashita
alternative_title: お菓子な悪役令嬢は没落後に甘党の王子に絡まれるようになりました ; Okashi na Akuyaku Reijou wa Botsurakugo ni Amatou no Ouji ni Karamareru you ni narimashita ; The Patissier Villainess Got Involved with the Sweet-Toothed Prince after Falling into Ruin
status: お菓子な悪役令嬢は没落後に甘党の王子に絡まれるようになりました ; Okashi na Akuyaku Reijou wa Botsurakugo ni Amatou no Ouji ni Karamareru you ni narimashita ; The Patissier Villainess Got Involved with the Sweet-Toothed Prince after Falling into Ruin
description:
Description :
        Countess Rena recalls her memories from before her reincarnation, when she was an assistant pastry chef, and realizes that she is playing the role of a villainous daughter in an Otome game world.
Her engagement is broken and she becomes a commoner, but she wants to open a confectionary store, which was her dream in her previous life...
Another world & love & work fantasy!
